name: Managing Threatening Situations - Kmart Way module
description: Training module completed in LMS prior to being rostered for the Customer Greeter role.
constraints: Managing Threatening Situations - Kmart Way module completed in LMS prior to being rostered.
When a Customer Greeter is on a break, the replacement Customer Greeter must have completed the minimum training standards listed below.
bestPractice: Report suspicious behaviour discreetly using P2T whilst adhering to the Managing Threatening Situations - 4Ds Poster.

If any of the above Customer Service Standards creates a threatening situation or aggressive behaviour from the customer, always adhere to the 5Ds and threatening situations. Report the incident to a manager discreetly.
All threatening situations must be reported via the Safety Solvsafety portal.
